# API Surface: testing

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| TestGenerator | class | Main class that loads YAML test specs and generates TypeScript test files with proper imports, test classes, and runners | test-generator.ts |
| generateTestsForSkill | method | Generates test file for a specific skill by reading YAML specs from tests/specs/{skillName}/ | test-generator.ts |
| generateAllTests | method | Iterates through all skill directories and generates tests for each | test-generator.ts |
